EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CxO_4_IHS_Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Analyst Report: Enable secure and profitable services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Report by Diane Myers on secure service enablement With rapid growth in the communications industry, service providers need to keep pace. With the move to IMS architectures, operators now have a unique opportunity to add capacity, increase revenue through new services, and increase agility to prepare for future evolution.
The IHS Markit report, written by Diane Myers, reveals findings on:
- Key market and technology trends for IMS and IP-based services - The architecture for service enablement - The components for enabling secure, reliable, high-performing services Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
